verbs.description: OPINION : President Donald Trump 's allies [V: are] discussing whether Michael Cohen will " flip . " Why not at least entertain the idea Cohen has no dirt on Trump ?

OPINION : President Donald Trump 's allies are discussing whether Michael Cohen [V: will] " flip . " Why not at least entertain the idea Cohen has no dirt on Trump ?

OPINION : President Donald Trump 's allies are discussing whether Michael Cohen will " flip . " [ARGM-PRP: Why] not [ARGM-ADV: at least] [V: entertain] [ARG1: the idea Cohen has no dirt on Trump] ?
